snippet.title: Zombots: Invasion - Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Demo
snippet.description:
Zombots is a fast-paced, wave-based survival FPS where players will have to utilize unique weapons, powerful upgrades, and exciting abilities to fend off hordes of invading robot zombies!

Developed by Ninja Elk Games
Release Date: March 7th, 2025

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #theforeseenarcade #steamnextfest #steamnextfestfebruary2025 #zombots #zombotsinvasion
